products.name: Classic Roast
products.description: A rich, full-bodied coffee with hints of chocolate and caramel. Perfect for starting your day with energy and flavor.

products.name: Dark Espresso
products.description: Intense and bold espresso blend with a rich crema. Ideal for espresso lovers who enjoy strong, concentrated flavors.

products.name: Vanilla Latte
products.description: Smooth latte with premium vanilla flavoring. A perfect balance of espresso and steamed milk with sweet vanilla notes.

products.name: Hazelnut Brew
products.description: Aromatic coffee infused with natural hazelnut flavoring. A delightful combination of coffee and nutty sweetness.

products.name: Cappuccino Supreme
products.description: Traditional cappuccino with perfect foam texture. Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

products.name: Mocha Delight
products.description: Rich chocolate and coffee combination. Perfect for those who love the marriage of coffee and chocolate flavors.

products.name: French Roast
products.description: Traditional French roast with smoky and intense flavors. A classic choice for those who prefer dark, bold coffee.

products.name: Iced Coffee Special
products.description: Refreshing cold brew coffee perfect for hot days. Smooth, less acidic, and naturally sweet.
